abstract: The maker of the Very Light Car, which won the prize in 2010, tested an E.V. version of the design recently in Michigan and returned the gaudy efficiency figure.
snippet: The maker of the Very Light Car, which won the prize in 2010, tested an E.V. version of the design recently in Michigan and returned the gaudy efficiency figure.

headline.main: Edison2, X Prize Winner, Claims 350 M.P.G. Equivalent for Prototype
